properties.areaDesc: Clay, AL; Randolph, AL; Cleburne, AL
properties.headline: Tornado Warning issued February 6 at 4:41AM CST until February 6 at 5:30AM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a

* Tornado Warning for...
Northwestern Randolph County in east central Alabama...
Southeastern Cleburne County in east central Alabama...
Northeastern Clay County in east central Alabama...

* Until 530 AM CST.

* At 441 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado
was located over Lineville, moving northeast at 65 mph.

HAZARD...Tornado.

SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation.

IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without
shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed.
Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur.  Tree
damage is likely.

* Locations impacted include...
Lineville, Ashland, Ranburne, Fruithurst, Muscadine, Morrison Cross
Roads, Barfield, Abernathy, Fosters Cross Roads, Delta, Corinth,
Hollis Crossroads, Newell, Ofelia, Trickem, Lake Cleburne, I 20
Welcome Center, Micaville and Graham.
properties.instruction:
TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest
floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a
mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter
and protect yourself from flying debris.

CMAMtext: NWS: TORNADO WARNING in this area til 5:30 AM CST. Take shelter now. Check media.
